trans-unit.source: Provides Web-application view-state-related-failure information.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Web 應用程式檢視狀態相關失敗的資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET raises events of type <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> when a view-state failure occurs.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會引發事件的型別<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>發生檢視狀態失敗時。

trans-unit.source: This failure indicates either an attempt to tamper with view state or its reuse from another machine with a different key.
trans-unit.target: 此錯誤表示嘗試竄改檢視狀態，或是從另一部電腦具有不同索引鍵重複使用。

trans-unit.source: The related audit event code is <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 相關的稽核事件代碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: The following is an excerpt of a configuration file showing how to configure the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider> to capture view-state failures.
trans-unit.target: 以下是示範如何設定組態檔的摘錄<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>擷取檢視狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For completeness we are showing the setup for the `provider` and `eventMappings` sections.
trans-unit.target: 為求完整起見，我們會顯示安裝程式`provider`和`eventMappings`區段。

trans-unit.source: They are already set by default.
trans-unit.target: 依預設已設定它們。

trans-unit.source: The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` section.
trans-unit.target: 唯一要做為提供的安裝程式`rules`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: Refer to `healthMonitoring` for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`healthMonitoring`。

trans-unit.source: To generate a view-state error, enter a URL in your browser with the following query string:
trans-unit.target: 若要產生的檢視狀態錯誤，請在瀏覽器中使用下列查詢字串輸入的 URL:

trans-unit.source: The Windows Application Eventlog will capture a view-state failure, if you enter the following configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔將會擷取檢視狀態失敗，如果您輸入下列組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件描述。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 做為事件來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件關聯的代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您實作自訂事件時，事件代碼必須大於 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" /> caused by the failure.
trans-unit.target: 失敗所造成的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的參數來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to instantiate a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不會使用它來具現化<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件描述。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 做為事件來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件關聯的代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您實作自訂事件時，事件代碼必須大於 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> value that specifies the detailed identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> 值，指定事件的詳細資料識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" /> caused by the failure.
trans-unit.target: 失敗所造成的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的參數來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to instantiate a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不會使用它來具現化<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception caused by the failure.
trans-unit.target: 取得失敗所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" /> caused by the failure.
trans-unit.target: 失敗所造成的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException> indicates either an attempt to tamper with view state or its reuse from another machine with a different key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateException>表示嘗試竄改檢視狀態，或者從另一部電腦具有不同索引鍵重複使用。
